DOC.detailed_description: The purpose pilot study test ability Transluminal Flow Encoding ( TAFE ) evaluate vessel specific ischemia patient clinical indication invasive coronary angiography ( ICA ) fractional flow reserve ( FFR ) measurement suspect coronary disease . TAFE novel method derives coronary blood flow easily obtainable non-invasive coronary CT angiogram . Participants undergo rest coronary CTA , regadenoson stress CT , clinically indicate invasive coronary angiogram . The study aim determine accuracy TAFE compare invasive fractional flow reserve . We hypothesize TAFE-derived coronary blood flow , coronary flow reserve , myocardial CT perfusion image accurately diagnose abnormal FFR ( < 0.80 ) measure vessel patient undergo invasive coronary angiography .
